summary: Completed comprehensive testing of CompTIA Linux+ XK0-006 learning app iteration 2. All new features (AI explanation with 6 providers, extended questions 100+ total, AI Settings dialog) are working correctly. Backend 100% pass rate, Frontend 95% pass rate.

issues: ESLint warnings for missing useEffect dependencies (aiEnabled, selectedModel) - non-blocking

passed_tests: GET /api/chapters - Returns 5 chapters with EN/DE titles
GET /api/questions/{chapter} - Returns questions for all 5 chapters
GET /api/questions - Extended questions working (100 total: 20 per chapter)
GET /api/ai/providers - Returns 6 AI providers (OpenAI, Gemini, Claude, DeepSeek, Qwen, Perplexity)
POST /api/ai/explain - Handles missing API key correctly
Dashboard loads with all 5 chapters and stats
Quiz flow - Answer questions and submit works
Quiz results page displays correct/incorrect answers
AI Settings button appears on results page
AI Settings dialog opens and shows all 6 providers with models
Flashcards page with 45 cards and navigation
Language toggle (DE/EN) works correctly - all text translates
critical_code_review_comments: Quiz.jsx has ESLint warnings for missing useEffect dependencies - consider adding aiEnabled and selectedModel to dependency arrays or using eslint-disable comments
seed_data_creation: None required - app works without login using localStorage
context_for_next_testing_agent: All core features tested and working: Quiz with 100 questions (20 per chapter), Flashcards (45 cards), Study Plan (20 weeks), AI Settings with 6 providers. Language toggle EN/DE works. AI explanation requires real API key to test actual AI response - UI flow tested without actual API call.

features_verified.quiz_functionality: PASS - Answer questions and submit works
features_verified.ai_settings_dialog: PASS - Opens and shows 6 providers with models
features_verified.flashcards: PASS - 45 cards with flip and navigation
features_verified.language_toggle: PASS - DE/EN switches all text correctly
